pre: The house inside of the dark forest makes my eyelids heavy with sleep. This drowsyness makes me able to sleep at any time. I wonder what my dreams would be like if I slept while under these effects?
researched: I woke up in my own dreams on an island floating nowhere. Red fogs and mists swirled around me. This place is insanity itself. I can almost feel my thoughts degrading from the oppressive atmosphere. Although I wish for nothing else but to leave, I know that I must stay and search for whatever treasure I may find here.
